CustomField.description: Email address to send an external post of a Release Alert, for example, an external Chatter group. Intended for sending Release Alerts to a Chatter group in a different Salesforce org.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter an email address to which Release Alerts will be posted when the "Post Release Alert" button is selected, for example, an external Chatter group.
CustomField.label: External Post Email
